title: BRIEF-Spear REIT Reports HY HEPS Of 45.47 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Spear REIT Reports HY HEPS Of 45.47 Cents

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 07:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Spear REIT Reports HY HEPS Of 45.47 Cents Oct 17 (Reuters) - Spear REIT Ltd : * JSE: SEA - SHORT-FORM ANNOUNCEMENT: UNAUDITED CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED INTERIM RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTH ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 * SPEAR REIT LTD - HY REVENUE INCREASED BY 18.10% TO R251.1 MILLION * SPEAR REIT LTD - HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 2.75% TO 45.47 CENTS PER SHARE * SPEAR REIT LTD - HY EARNINGS PER SHARE DECREASED BY 75.06% TO 14.51 CENTS PER SHARE * SPEAR REIT LTD - TO DECLARE AN INTERIM GROSS DIVIDEND OF 44.63992 CENTS PER SHARE * SPEAR REIT LTD - FY2020 DISTRIBUTION PER SHARE GROWTH ON TARGET FOR 6% TO 8% GROWTH FROM FY2019

BRIEF-Spear REIT Reports HY HEPS Of 45.47 Cents
